com.spotify.apollo.environment

Interface EnvironmentFactory


  • public interface EnvironmentFactory
    A factory that provides Apollo application environments.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  EnvironmentFactory.Resolver 
      static interface  EnvironmentFactory.RoutingContext
      A EnvironmentFactory.RoutingContext is a context object for routing components set up by the application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Environment create(String serviceName, EnvironmentFactory.RoutingContext routingContext)
      Create a new application environment.
      EnvironmentFactory.RoutingContext createRoutingContext()
      Creates a EnvironmentFactory.RoutingContext to be used with an Environment.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        Environment create(String serviceName,
                   EnvironmentFactory.RoutingContext routingContext)
        Create a new application environment.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - The application name
        routingContext - A routing context for the created Environment

      • createRoutingContext

        EnvironmentFactory.RoutingContext createRoutingContext()
        Creates a EnvironmentFactory.RoutingContext to be used with an Environment.
        Returns:
        A EnvironmentFactory.RoutingContext instance
